trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 与此自动化对等方关联的元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that holds the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The class name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 类名<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"></xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取的控件模式<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"></xref>关联<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 指定的控件模式的 value 枚举。

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is , , , , , , or ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is , , , , , , or ; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Hides all nodes, controls, or content that are descendants of the control.
trans-unit.target: 隐藏所有节点、 控件或内容的控件的后代。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider>接口。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: Displays all child nodes, controls, or content of the control.
trans-unit.target: 显示所有子节点、 控件或内容的控件。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider>接口。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取状态、 展开或折叠的与此关联的控件<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider>接口。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The state of the control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 与此关联控件的状态<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content area of a container object in order to display the control within the visible region of the container.
trans-unit.target: 为了显示控件在容器的可见区域内滚动的内容区域的容器对象。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider>接口。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 不会实现。

trans-unit.source: The user cannot interact with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 用户不能与交互<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"></xref>关联<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A element other than the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer"></xref> is selected.
trans-unit.target: 以外的其他元素<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"></xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer"></xref>选择。

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 不会实现。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider>接口。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer"></xref> is selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"> </xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer"></xref>选择。
